version_description: Thanks for being a part of the SoLo community! This update lets borrowers increase their Borrowing Limit by paying back their loans on time. Some other minor changes are also included, such as less confusing rollover deadlines and a total current investme

Thanks for being a part of the SoLo community! This update features general bug fixes and resolves consistency issues. Lenders have the ability to sort the marketplace by their Tip Percentage. Edit Tip shows the current Tip. More legible text on the form

Thanks for being a part of the SoLo community!

- We heard that you wanted funds delivered faster, and that is now available. This update gives borrowers the option to expedite the transfer of funds by using a debit card.
- The account managemen

Thanks for being a part of the SoLo community!

This update fixes certain 404 errors that may appear when opening websites in safari. Fix for a minor inconsistency in the Bank and Card Info screen.

Your feedback is always valuable to us. Don

Thanks for being a part of the SoLo community!

In this update, the number of completed transactions are now displayed for borrowers on the details of a loan. It also fixes an issue with not seeing the option to rollover when it should be available.

Thanks for being a part of the SoLo community!

This update fixes an issue with the wrong message showing on the bank and card information screen when there are pending transactions.

Your feedback is always valuable to us. Don’t go alone, go

This update fixes the loading screen overlapping with the camera view when scanning licenses.

Your feedback is always valuable to us. Don’t go alone, go SoLo.

Thanks for being a part of the SoLo community! This update is an important one.

This update means no more transaction fees when using debit cards! Funds are now transferred almost instantly. The trade off is that a debit card is now required to par

Thanks for being a part of the SoLo community!

This update completely changes the bank login process, the new process should be much easier, with more banks supported.

Your feedback is always valuable to us. Don’t go alone, go SoLo.

This update allows you to easily change your debit card.
